Detailed Description

Knowledge manages the linguistic information for Japanese morphological analysis.

Definition at line 21 of file knowledge.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum jma::Knowledge::EncodeType

Encode type of characters.

Enumerator:
ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP  EUC-JP character type.
ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS  SHIFT-JIS character type.
ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8  UTF-8 character type.
ENCODE_TYPE_NUM  the count of character types

Member Function Documentation

void jma::Knowledge::addUserDict ( const char *  fileName  ) 

Add the file name of user dictionary file, which is in text format.

This function could be called more than once, so that multiple user dictionaries could be added.

Parameters:
fileName the file name

virtual int jma::Knowledge::loadDict (  )  [pure virtual]

Load the dictionaries, which are set by setSystemDict() and addUserDict().

Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success
Precondition:
the directory path of system dictionary should be set by setSystemDict().

if any user dictionary file need to be loaded, the file name should be added by addUserDict().

Implemented in jma::JMA_Knowledge.

Referenced by main().

virtual int jma::Knowledge::loadSentenceSeparatorConfig ( const char *  fileName  )  [pure virtual]

Load the sentence separator configuration file, which is in text format.

This file each separator character(only one character) per line.

Parameters:
fileName the file name
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success

Implemented in jma::JMA_Knowledge.

Referenced by main().

virtual int jma::Knowledge::loadStopWordDict ( const char *  fileName  )  [pure virtual]

Load the stop-word dictionary file, which is in text format.

The words in this file are ignored in the morphological analysis result.

Parameters:
fileName the file name
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success

Implemented in jma::JMA_Knowledge.

void jma::Knowledge::setEncodeType ( EncodeType  type  ) 

Set the character encode type.

If this function is not called, the default value returned by getEncodeType() is ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP.

Parameters:
type the encode type
